channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Teen suspect in Mississippi synagogue fire indicted on state hate crime charges
item.description: The suspect allegedly set the fire due to the building’s “Jewish ties,” the FBI said in a charging affidavit.

item.title: Wisconsin Gov. Evers questions his lieutenant governor’s immigration enforcement proposal
Will the price of silver hit $100 per ounce this January? 3 things to consider now
item.description: The price of silver is sitting near a record high. Here's why it could pass the $100 per ounce mark this January.

item.title: Some of the military options Trump could consider against Iran
item.description: The president's top national security advisers met Tuesday to consider action against Iran over its crackdown on protesters.

item.title: WATCH: Paraglider survives nearly 500-foot fall into ocean
item.description: A paraglider survived a nearly 500-foot fall into the ocean off the coast of Florida, authorities say.

item.title: Director Timothy Busfield turns himself in to face child sex abuse charges in New Mexico
item.description: Director and Emmy Award-winning actor Timothy Busfield turned himself in Tuesday to authorities in New Mexico to face child sex abuse charges.

item.title: ACA enrollment sinks sharply as coverage costs soar in 2026
item.description: Roughly 1.4 million fewer Americans have signed up for an Affordable Care Act plan as expiring tax breaks drive up premiums.
